div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2308 Cap Djinet, 20 km. W of Dellys, (330) Algeria, 1902 Burial: c. A.D. 18 (Jenkins) Contents: 25 AR. Pot hoard Mauretania, Juba II: 12 den. (to yr. 43 = A.D. 18) Juba II with Cleopatra: 12 den. Juba II with Ptolemy: 1 den. (yr. 36 = A.D. 11) Disposition: Algiers † Gsell, BCTH 1903, pp. clx f. (Gsell's suggestion that the coin of Juba-Ptolemy should be read yr. 46 seems without foundation); Mélanges d'archéologie et d'histoire 1903, p. 277; Procés-verbaux, Commission de l'Afrique du Nord, 1903, pp. vii-viii Bull. internat. de num. 1904, p. 36 AA 1904, p. 137
